title: Anyone able to help?
body: So long story short I installed an AMD R7 360 back into my PC that had been in it before I swapped to my Geforce 550ti and now with the AMD back in my PC everything is fine and dandy except when I go to my hextech crafting page or try to start a game league crashes every single time and I have ran the repair on the league client, unistalled and then installed league and my graphics card drivers again, I'm at a lose and Riot hasn't gotten back to my ticket for a few days now was hoping someone has dealt with this problem before.

replies.body: I've seen this issue reported recently, and it seems to be a problem with third party programs not interacting with League properly.  If you have apps like play.tv, disable them and try again.  That should get you fixed up, but let me know if you have any issues.
